The reason why our DA PUMPED even though we did it before whitelist?

We educated buyers.

Educate the people minting your project before giving them WL. Educate the people buying your project.

People sell because low confidence majority of the time or lack of value.

People are asking me why Cartoons didn't moon and Antonym performed really well?

Whitelist distribution.

Majority of Antonym's WL was distributed for people that listened to an AMA.

Majority of Cartoon's WL was distributed to communities, discord spammers and upwork workers.
